PreceptDef.label: desired
PreceptDef.description:
A true work of art is the revelation of a new conception of life arising in the artist's soul, which, when expressed, lights up the path along which humanity progresses.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists with "Low" expectations or higher will demand art pieces around the colony, at the very least one per colonist.

thoughtStageDescriptions.li: Very little art around (less than 1 per colonist)
A few art pieces around (less than 1,5 per colonist)
Several art pieces around (less than 2 per colonist)
Lots of art pieces around (less than 3 per colonist)

li.label: no art nearby
li.description: This colony is barren of fine art. A disgrace.

li.label: very little art around
li.description: There are only a bunch of art pieces around: where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.

li.label: a few art pieces around
li.description: This colony is starting to look like a proper art gallery. Life beats down and crushes the soul and art reminds you that you have one.

li.label: several art pieces around
li.description: The colony is adorned with several art pieces. Human life is full of chaos and suffering and the name of the remedy is ‘beauty’.

li.label: lots of art pieces around
li.description: There are a lot of art pieces in this colony. This warms my soul.

li.label: surrounded by art
li.description: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
